Documentation for the tasa_website repository¶

This is the documentation for TASA’s website. Basic knowledge of Python, HTML, CSS, SQL, and JS is assumed.

General background:¶

  • Modules vs. packages

  • HTTP requests

  • When calling make run, run.py is executed.

  • tasa_website folder (non-package)

      • Imports
      • Statements
  • tasa_website folder (package)
    • __init__.py
      • Imports
      • Global Variables and Statements
      • Methods
